title: Thanks for quick Quest Log update!

comments.content: Seeing as there was a thread complaining about how long it took to get the Hobbits into the quest log, I'd like to take a second to thank FFG for the swiftness of adding in Gondor!

Eric W said:

I second this observation! Well done & THANK YOU GUYS FOR CREATING THIS WICKED EXPANSION!!!!!ยก! Seeing as there was a thread complaining about how long it took to get the Hobbits into the quest log, I'd like to take a second to thank FFG for the swiftness of adding in Gondor!
Still no Battle in the Lake-Town? Why?
